title: The Unexpected Marriage
overview: Liu Chang Sheng is a beautiful princess from Fuyu. She is optimistic, cheerful, quick-witted and has a sharp tongue. Since childhood, she reads poetry and books, understands righteousness, and aspires to become a woman who does not lose to men. However, she causes strange bad luck to men who comes near her. They would get either drowned or get their leg broken. This makes it difficult for her to get married as most men rejects her.
